channel.title: Npc dialogue
channel.description:
Alright, i know how to add npc dialogue but when i click "click here to continue" it just closes the window. Its supposed to bring you to a window where it says Yes, please. or No, thank you.
If you say yes please, it teleports you to the mining area.. i didnt get any errors everything worked fine until i came to click to continue. Please help!

item.title: Npc dialogue
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john

Alright, i know how to add npc dialogue but when i click “click here to continue” it just closes the window.
Its supposed to bring you to a window where it says Yes, please.
or
No, thank you.

If you say yes please, it teleports you to the mining area… i didnt get any errors everything worked fine until i came to
click to continue.
